name: Safari Rescue
description:
Hello! It is nice to meet you. I made a game. It has lots of animals!

SAFARI RESCUE is the name of my game. You have to rescue the animals with your helicopter net! Can you rescue all the animals? I sure hope you can!

FEATURES:
◆ Zebras
◆ Giraffes
◆ Lions
◆ Hippos
◆ Elephant
◆ Bees
◆ And so much more!

I hope you really like it!

*****************************

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING:

“If the mind is the body, Safari Rescue is the spirit.”
- Walt Whitman (Attr.)

"Safari Rescue will make you weep tears of gold. It will rip out your heart and launch it into the sky, where it will join your spirit in eternal frolics. It will see your every moment suspended as thick drops of savory honey, electrify you with the thrill of life itself, and shrink all the world’s oceans to a melody in your step. None of those are metaphors."
- Wikipedia (Briefly)

“Safari Rescue is my favorite. I like animals.”
- Ernest Hemingway (Attr.)

“Iff Man should be Troubled by Dolours of the Heart, as Manifested by Coldness in the Right-Most Toothe, that Man shalt rightly resolve to Safari Rescue thrice Daily and bury the Toothe in an Orchard.”
- Traditional Folk Remedy
